node.display_long_description:
Racket: Nx是一款前所未见的游戏，旨在挑战玩家在VR中使用球拍的极限。

游戏特色：
- 2种单人模式——故事模式和无尽跑者模式！
- 对战&合作多人游戏，支持跨平台和同一用户跨设备！
- 超棒的原创配乐，你也可以在游戏中播放自己的音乐！

游戏在巨大的玻璃穹顶内进行，你必须用球摧毁墙壁上亮起的目标。

但这可不是普通的球！

用力击打它，它就会撞破墙壁滚过去，并且推倒路上的一切！

使用你的球拍的牵引光束把它拉回来，或者干脆把下一拍瞄准你想要击打的地方。

速度要快，计划好你的击球，学会完美地控制它。

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Release notes for update v2.2.14:
- New stuff for next month ♫
- Minor fixes

nodes.title: League Upgrade!
nodes.body_text:
Season 4 is here!

And if this wasn't enough, we have also launched an update that will make the new season more interesting and competitive:
- Glicko rating system - your score reflects your performance more accurately
- Matchmaking - you are matched against players of your skill level (when possible)
- High five - enabled
- Bug fixes and improvements

So jump right into action, and come share your experience with our community on Discord

nodes.title: Co-op Update!
nodes.body_text:
Today we're rolled out a brand new game mode for Racket: Nx - Co-op!
Co-op lets you team up with a friend or stranger and play shoulder to shoulder for the high score in a game against time!
We expect a lot of new players to join and veteran players to pop back in, so please be nice and welcoming.

This is the biggest update to RNX since launch, and after playtesting it for several weeks now, we've found it to be a super fun and bonding experience.
As always, this mode can be played cross platform and between devices sharing the same account, so hopefully some of you will be able to play with your kids, spouses and arch-enemies.

In addition to Co-op mode, we've added a few game mechanics to Arcade, making it more dynamic and interesting. These additions change Arcade enough for us to have had to reset the leaderboards. Apologies. We do hope you find these new changes worth it, though!

Thank you all for sticking with us as we continue to develop and expand RNX!

node.reviewDescription:
I've purchased quite a few games so far after getting the Q2 for Xmas, and out of all of them, this is by far my favourite. So much fun, and keeps me coming back for more to see if I can beat my last score.

One thing I would change is the option to change the music during the game. It's so annoying when there's a tune playing that I like and it changes when I long press the trigger button. Please change the button to do this to a button less used during the game.

Update: The makers have added a Power-up mushroom to the game and it shoots you up making you taller and shoots you back down after a little while. My body did not enjoy this update, moments later I had a headache and had to stop playing. Thought maybe it was a one off, so the next day (today) I played again and yet again I got the mushroom (by mistake as I was trying to avoid it) and yet again another headache!!!

There are some great new levels so it's not all bad, but it's annoying I have to avoid the mushroom for now on to avoid a headaches which is something I thought I'd never say 

Gone from a 5/5 game to a 4.5/5 game.
node.reviewTitle: Best game on Quest 2..... but new update

developerResponse.body:
Hey there, thanks for the review and sorry about the experience with the mushroom powerup. We'll look into tuning it.

As for switching tracks, it's not the trigger but the joystick that does it. Holding it left or right for a moment will change the music track, so hopefully it shouldn't happen by accident.
